message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I have to consider the minimum price I'm willing to accept to make this sale worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1025000. Is this a price you'd be comfortable with?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the initial price you mentioned.

I understand that you're trying to drive the price down, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $975000. I'm willing to make a compromise and meet you halfway between our last two offers, which would be $1002500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1002500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the initial price you mentioned.

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting stuck in a loop here. I'm willing to make one more serious offer to try to break the impasse. I'll meet you at $990000, which is as low as I'm willing to go. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far. If you're not comfortable with this, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more serious offer, but I'm still a bit higher than $990000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $955000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the negotiations we've had so far.
